title: Connect more profiles
description: Connect up to 25 Overwatch profiles to your Discord ID.

title: Newsboard1
description: Set up a channel to receive the latest Overwatch news.

title: Custom embeds color
description: Customize most of the embeds by changing their color.

title: Usage stats
description: View your command usage statistics, including the number and types of commands used.

title: Discord role
description: Gain access to the Premium role on OverBot's official Discord server.
